excerpt.rendered: Explore the beautiful Rockies from high alpine terrain with views of 14 thousand-foot peaks all on bike. Our bike rentals, located in Breckenridge, Colorado, offer numerous options for biking on trails, paved paths, in town, or downhill at Breckenridge Resort. Choose from E-bikes, leisure bikes, and mountain bikes.
